mapper.select: /* snippSUrlLog.getAllLogListByShortLink */ SELECT SSUAL.UID AS LOG_UID ,SSUAL.SHORT_URL ,SSU.ORIGIN_URL AS ORIGIN_URL ,SSUAL.USER_UID ,SSUAL.ACCESS_IP ,SSUAL.ACCESS_USER_AGENT ,SSUAL.ACCESS_DATE ,SSUAL.ACCESS_TP FROM SNP_SHORTEN_URL_ACCESS_LOG SSUAL INNER JOIN SNP_SHORTEN_URL SSU ON SSU.SHORT_URL = SSUAL.SHORT_URL WHERE 1 = 1 AND SSUAL.SHORT_URL = #{shortUrl} ORDER BY SSUAL.ACCESS_DATE DESC
